resources.string: Password must be 8 char long with 1 UpperCase letter, 1 special character, 1 Number

Expense Tracker application will keep and track of income-expense of a user on a day to day basis. 
Each user will be required to register to use the application. 
This application contains a calculator that takes income (annually), maximum daily expense, and the amount of saving a user plans to reach annually as inputs and calculates the amount of saving. 
If the user exceeds the daily expense limit, the amount of saving is reduced by the amount of extra expense. 
If the saving becomes 0 then it gives you a new daily expense amount to maintain the saving goals, and if the daily expense is less than the amount of planned expense, then it will add the surplus to the saving. 
The expense tracking application will generate a report at the end of a month to show incomeexpense via multiple graphs.

COST: FREE
Developed by
RISHITHA PERICHERLA 
and
SAKTHI KARTHIGAI SELVI SEKAR

Whether you have a comment or suggestion to share, we look forward to hearing from you. 

Feel free to reach out by emailing sakthikarthigaiselvi@gmail.com.

For technical help, email us at quicklogs@gmail.com.
If you would rather call us or send us a letter, you can reach us at 1250 Bellflower Blvd, LongBeach, CA 90840 | 555–222–0000.

Create Account
Add Daily Expense under Add Expense 
Add Annual Income and Desired Annual Savings in Calculate Daily savings.
Click on Predict Menu to View the Todays Savings and How Much money You Should Save to Reach your Desired Annual Savings

Does the app has in-app Purchases? 
Ans: No, The app is free to use.

Can I view the report of my expenses?
Ans: Yes, U can view the graph of how much u have spent in a particular category by clicking the Category Tab

Do I get a report of my Daily Expenses?
Ans: Yes, A line graph is displayed on the Home page to show the track of your daily expenses
